alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Rutland; Lamoille; Orleans; Western Addison; Western Rutland (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 12 at 3:20AM EST until January 13 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Orleans, Lamoille, Addison, Rutland, Eastern Franklin, and Eastern Chittenden Counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Scattered to widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind gusts will be from the southeast direction and reach peak intensity between 3 and 8 AM Saturday.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Rutland; Lamoille; Orleans; Western Addison; Western Rutland
